name: gitHex.cherryPickSingle
description: Cherry-pick a single commit with configurable merge strategy. REQUIRES: clean working tree (no uncommitted changes). Aborts cleanly on conflict.

repoPath.description: Path to the git repository (defaults to single configured root)

commit.description: Commit hash or ref to cherry-pick (required)

headBefore.description: HEAD commit hash before the operation

headAfter.description: HEAD commit hash after the operation (same as headBefore if noCommit=true)

sourceCommit.description: Full hash of the commit that was cherry-picked

summary.description: Human-readable explanation of what was done
